titles.title: To require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to establish a pilot program for certifying the status of a small business concern as a small business concern owned and controlled by socially and economically disadvantaged individuals, and for other purposes.
Streamlining Small Disadvantaged Businesses Act
Streamlining Small Disadvantaged Businesses Act
Streamlining Small Disadvantaged Businesses Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Streamlining Small Disadvantaged Businesses Act
This bill directs the Small Business Administration to establish a pilot program to certify qualifying small business concerns as owned and controlled by socially and economically disadvantaged individuals.
